page.title: 09 RELIGION
page.content: In our survey block there are many different places of worship. These include Kettering Parish Church of S.S. Peter and Paul, and St.Micheal's Church, both Church of England; Toller Chapel and London Road,both United Reformed; Fuller Baptist Chuch,Central Methodist, Pollard Memorial Church, St. Edward's Roman Catholic, Jehovah's Witness Kingdom Hall, and a Spiritualist Church. There are also other meeting places of various splinter groups from the main churches. Most of the Christian Churches have organisations within the community e.g. Women's Institute, Scouts, Cubs, Guides and Brownies. Ketteing is also the birthplace of the Baptist Missionary Society which was launched by Andrew Fuller.
